entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 9. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
